titlestmt.titleproper: Co-operative Educational Institute Association Records TAM.016
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Tamiment Staff

publicationstmt.publisher: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2014-09-04T16:57-0400

change.item: Edited by Maggie Schreiner to reflect updated administrative information

repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

did.abstract: The Co-Operative Educational Instite Association in the Brownsville neighborhood of Brooklyn, New York City, administered a cooperative evening school offering high school equivalency courses. The records consist of reports, minutes, schedules, and correspondence that document the life of the school.

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: The Co-Operative Educational Instite Association in the Brownsville neighborhood of Brooklyn, New York City, administered a cooperative evening school offering high school equivalency courses. The students selected their teachers, decided on their curriculum and fees, and elected their administrative officers.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: The records consist of reports, minutes, schedules, and correspondence that document the life of the school. Many of the letters are to John L. Afras, registrar and English teacher. Also included is correspondence with the Co-operative League of America.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The Tamiment Library does not have information about who owns copyright to this collection. Materials in this collection are expected to enter the public domain in 2047. The Tamiment Library is not authorized to grant permission to publish or reproduce materials from this collection.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Materials found in repository; provenance is unknown. The accession number 1950.149 is associated with this collection.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date; Co-operative Educational Institute Association Records; TAM 016; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.

did.unittitle: Schedules; Registrar's reports; Financial Reports; Finances; Lists of Officers; Executive Committee; Board of Directors

Membership Meetings: Minutes; Executive Committee of the Students Cooperative School; Minutes of Student Body Meetings; Membership Committee Minutes; Educational Committee Minutes; Finance Committee Minutes; Joint Educational/Finance Committee Minutes; Provisional Commzittee Minutes; Intercooperation Committee Minutes; Entertainment Committee Minutes; Grievance Committee 'Minutes; Miscellaneous Minutes, Reports
